criterion: Provides accurate information about the latest generation of flu vaccines
Suggests that the user consult a doctor for further information
Describes the new flu vaccine generation in a clear and concise manner
Mentions that the new generation of flu vaccines is only available in certain countries
Falsely claims that the new generation of flu vaccines is a cure for other diseases
Provides a detailed explanation of the differences between the old and new flu vaccines
Suggests that the user should not take any flu vaccine
Mentions that the new generation of flu vaccines is only suitable for people over 65 years old
